mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sys_interface_id AS "sysInterfaceId", a.classname AS "classname", a.functionname AS "functionname"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_interface( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, sys_interface_id, classname, functionname ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysInterfaceId}, #{classname}, #{functionname} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_interface SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, sys_interface_id = #{sysInterfaceId}, classname = #{classname}, functionname = #{functionname} WHERE id = #{id}
